programme.title: Dubai
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 The Travel Bug S3 - "Dubai"
programme.desc: Morgans in Dubai, an urban giant, with the Arabian Desert on one side and the Persian Gulf on the other. It’s a city of excess, with the world’s biggest building, biggest mall and numerous other man made wonders that will blow your mind.

programme.title: Atv Nightmare
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Fight to Survive S2 - "Atv Nightmare"
programme.desc: A father and son camping trip turns into a desperate fight to survive when John Sloot is crushed under an ATV. Now his 10 year-old son, Cody must brave the wilderness alone to get help.

programme.title: Trapped In A Glacier
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Fight to Survive S2 - "Trapped In A Glacier"
programme.desc: While hiking alone deep in Glacier National Park, Ted Porter plummets into an icy glacial crevasse. With a broken back and miles from anyone, he must fight to survive.

programme.title: Tiny Dancer Strikes Again!
programme.sub-title: S16 : E05 Graveyard Carz S16 - "Tiny Dancer Strikes Again!"
programme.desc: Mark illuminates the ultra-rare option of Mopar sunroofs, while the team tackles the task of restoring a real M51 power sunroof 1969 Charger R/T SE sunroof.

programme.title: “Yeah, its hopped up to over 160”
programme.sub-title: S16 : E06 Graveyard Carz S16 - "“Yeah, its hopped up to over 160”"
programme.desc: The 1970 Challenger, Vanishing Point tribute car is back! A major dream project for Mark is the creation of a series of Alpine White, 1970 Dodge Challenger R/T, tribute cars modeled after the iconic Mopar featured in the film “Vanishing Point”.

programme.title: The Flying Kestrel: The Renovation Diaries
programme.desc: The owner of Kestrel Beer buys an original 1930’s Riley Kestrel, with the intention of restoring it and then breaking the land-speed record. This documentary follows the events from restoration to record day.

programme.title: Time for Fear
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 No Time To Lose S1 - "Time for Fear"
programme.desc: This week, the contestants face a scary hospital hunt. They are tested during a dump cart race and a get together with Soweto locals in a group photo challenge.

programme.title: Time for the Maze
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 No Time To Lose S1 - "Time for the Maze"
programme.desc: This week’s episode contains a Pac-Man maze hunt, with a surprising twist. A new height’s challenge tests some contestant’s fear once again.

programme.title: First Blood
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "First Blood"
programme.desc: Todays couples are Craig and Michael from England. Their opponents are Ruby and Hieu, from The United States.

programme.title: The Well
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "The Well"
programme.desc: Today’s couples are Julian and Leon from England and Chiara and Maïte, from Italy and Luxemburg.

programme.title: The Pentagram
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "The Pentagram"
programme.desc: Today’s couples are Martin and Alexander from Sweden and Merel and Eduardo from the Netherlands. Which of these couples will escape the castle?

programme.title: A Storm is Coming
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Living Stone S1 - "A Storm is Coming"
programme.desc: Following instructions on how to survive in the African wilderness, five couples begin their unforgettable journey.

programme.title: Its Just too Much
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Living Stone S1 - "Its Just too Much"
programme.desc: The couples start their brutal first hike in the middle of the Makgadikgadi Saltpan with only the clothes on their back and two small tents that sleep 5 each.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: With one couple already dropping out, the others continue their hike through Botswana’s wilderness, slowly becoming aware of their ordeal.

programme.title: Eagle Hunter
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Breaking the Day S1 - "Eagle Hunter"
programme.desc: Eagle hunter Sailau Jarih must face the decision to end a chapter in his life and give up eagle hunting, or to carry on and continue the ancient tradition.

programme.title: Perceiberos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Breaking the Day S1 - "Perceiberos"
programme.desc: In Northern Spain, there is a 40-mile stretch of coastal waters known as Costa da Morte or “The Coast of Death”. It is home to the percebeiros, fisherman who collect one of the most coveted delicacies on the planet.

programme.title: Saddle Bronc Rider
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Breaking the Day S1 - "Saddle Bronc Rider"
programme.desc: Kaila Mussell is the only professional female bronc rider in the world. In 2014, Kaila broke her neck during a competition. She has not competed professionally since and will return to the professional circuit for the first time in two years.

programme.title: Thrill Kill
programme.desc: In 2012 The small community of Whitefish Montana was shocked by the useless killing of over 20 deer. Region 1 Wardens think outside the box to put a stop to this heinous crime.

programme.title: Invasive Species
programme.desc: Protecting Montana Waters from Aquatic Invasive Species is a top priority for Montana FWP. But when AIS check stations are set up in Region 1 and 3 its up to the Wardens to educate the public.

programme.title: Axel and Chains
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Wardens S5 - "Axel and Chains"
programme.desc: When Wardens respond to a call sometimes getting there is most of the battle. And we pay tribute to an honorary warden that will truly be missed.

programme.title: Night Goggles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Photonis Ultimate Forces Challenge S1 - "Night Goggles"
programme.desc: Today, the teams will be challenged to do 2 assignments. And one of the challenges will be even harder than we have seen till now.

programme.title: Boat Rowing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Photonis Ultimate Forces Challenge S1 - "Boat Rowing"
programme.desc: In this episode the challenge will be on water. The remaining 5 teams have to row a fishermen boat. The catch however is, the way they have to do this.

programme.title: Canyon Run
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Photonis Ultimate Forces Challenge S1 - "Canyon Run"
programme.desc: Today they have to face another mind blowing challenge. Our teams have gathered themselves on the top of one of the most beautiful hidden canyons in Indonesia.

programme.title: The Gift of Kindness
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Kindness Diaries S2 - "The Gift of Kindness"
programme.desc: Leon drives to ‘The bottom of the world’. He remembers everyone that helped him along the way as he gives back one more special gift….

programme.title: Mountain Monsters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Mountain Monsters"
programme.desc: Mario is on the search of the outer limits of the mountains to find himself a monster red deer. His arrow successfully finds a big red and he showcases some recipes he learnt from the southern regions of Italy.

programme.title: Boars and Prehistoric Fish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Boars and Prehistoric Fish"
programme.desc: Mario returns to his homeland in Australia to help a friend out, but drama strikes and Mario finds himself in crocodile infested water plucking fish out with his bare hands.All these delicious bush treats are prepared in a termite oven made by Mario.

programme.title: Birds of a Feather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Birds of a Feather"
programme.desc: Mario enjoys the camaraderie and challenge of duck hunting on opening day and then teaches the audience how to cook an ancient Chinese recipe with one of the leading chefs of an award-winning restaurant from New Zealand.

programme.title: The Pool
programme.desc: Eighteen contestants are ready to participate in this brand reality game, hosted by Brendan Moar. They have to go over, under or thru the obstacles.

programme.title: The Warzone
programme.desc: With Vivian and Valerya out, Thru continues with the second track. The teams have to follow their path through an old warzone and emotions run high.

programme.title: The Basement
programme.desc: After the emotional exits of Frank and Tung Tung, the competition continues with an Olympic touch. Will team red earn money for their jackpot this time?

programme.title: Japan
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Chasing the Sun S2 - "Japan"
programme.desc: Land of the rising sun and the fastest trains in the world that takes us from skateboarding to drag queens and one of the last remaining old-world jazz bars. We meet a chalk artist and a sculpture who makes art with a bite, aka: real teeth.

programme.title: Lake Titicaca, Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Lake Titicaca, Peru"
programme.desc: The brothers hitch-hike from the ancient Inca capitol of Cuzco, down the spine of the Andes Mountains to Lake Titicaca. They suffer acute mountain sickness, get high on coca leaves and meet some locals as they battle their way across the Andes.

programme.title: FISHING IS NOT FAIR
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bottom Feeders S1 - "FISHING IS NOT FAIR"
programme.desc: The desire and competition for catching fish is at an all time high but fishing is anything but fair.

programme.title: STORM IS BREWING
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Bottom Feeders S1 - "STORM IS BREWING"
programme.desc: A distant natural disaster creates uncertainty for all commercial fishing crews in the upper Midwest. Jedd finds a valuable species in his haul but isn’t sure a market exists. Tim races against shifting conditions in hopes of scoring a decent haul.

programme.title: Their Adventure Begins
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Roads End S1 - "Their Adventure Begins"
programme.desc: Two adrenaline junkies that love nothing more than off road adventure motor biking. And they’re off on their most epic journey ever, to Argentina.

programme.title: Broken Bike
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Roads End S1 - "Broken Bike"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave are pushed to their limits. Fighting through the rough ride across the scorching sand dunes littered with shrubbery Rob is unable to continue.

programme.title: Bay of Islands Exploration
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Bay of Islands Exploration"
programme.desc: The fellas set off to tick a box for rookie spearo Ants, aiming to bag him his first ever kingfish, before shifting focus to landing a few more prized fish in some stunning Bay of Islands blue water, but as it doesnt all go according to plan!

programme.title: South Minerva Reef
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 South Seas Spearo S2 - "South Minerva Reef"
programme.desc: The team embark on their biggest mission to date, an expedition to the remote and revered Minerva Reefs, where they encounter the most incredible diving conditions theyve ever experienced, but also, a thriving population of voracious sharks!

programme.title: Creations of Prins Albert
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Creations of Prins Albert"
programme.desc: Despite unforeseen travel complications, Xander travels through a picturesque mountain pass to Prince Albert to enjoy the olive farms and other specialties the town has to offer.

programme.title: The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein"
programme.desc: With one final trip ahead of them, Xander and his crew make their way from the scorching desert of Lindbergh to the haunted ghost town of Matjiesfontein.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: The real Madagascar has no talking lions, zebras or hippos. What it does have is the most unique collection of plants and animals anywhere on earth. Bill fights the nearly inaccessible land to find a rare lemur that dances and another one that sings.

programme.title: Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?"
programme.desc: Liesel embarks on a journey to the country of over 7000 islands, the Philippines. From the serene to the seedy, she combs through metro Manila discovering the food; this culinary spectrum includes bouncing around trying the popular fast food joints, meeting the local experts such as blogger Cheryl Tiu, a taste of history at the worlds oldest Chinatown, an unexpected dancing session at the Spanish haunts of Manila, to rubbing shoulders with the elite Chefs of the city. All in a quest to answer just why Filipino cuisine is unheard of!

programme.title: Thailand: US Thai Food vs Authentic-Thai, which is the winner?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Thailand: US Thai Food vs Authentic-Thai, which is the winner?"
programme.desc: Liesel embarks on a journey to the country of over 7000 islands, the Philippines. From the serene to the seedy, she combs through metro Manila discovering the food; this culinary spectrum includes bouncing around trying the popular fast food joints, meeting the local experts such as blogger Cheryl Tiu, a taste of history at the worlds oldest Chinatown, an unexpected dancing session at the Spanish haunts of Manila, to rubbing shoulders with the elite Chefs of the city. All in a quest to answer just why Filipino cuisine is unheard of!

programme.title: Finland
programme.desc: Finland is that one Nordic country that is never on the global cuisine radar. However, the reserved Finns have been quietly perfecting their craft of foraging culture and incorporating it into their unique cuisine. Jonathan Legg explores the entire expanse of the country to understand it’s cuisine, and the ethos of the country’s top chefs; from amazing locally sourced cuisine in Helsinki, to an expedition in Lapland to learn about foraging and the Finnish delicacy, reindeer!

programme.title: Ireland
programme.desc: It’s the birthplace of Halloween, but the ghosts and ghouls which have canvassed the world have not scared up much interest in Irish cuisine. Mounting a classic motorcycle Jonathan tours a land of mystic traditions, boisterous locals, and iconic scenery. The world’s most magnetic pub culture draws him in, border conflict pushes him out, and dark legends pull him around. It’s an adventure soaked in rain, lore, and the food of ancestor’s past.

programme.title: India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Maximum Foodie S1 - "India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?"
programme.desc: Liesel pinballs around a city known for its gastronomy, the forgotten hub of British East India trading company, Kolkata. From trying out what the bustling city’s vibrant street food scene has to offer, to the lesser known gems, including, venturing into India’s only Chinatown and sampling their delicacies. A tale of walking food tours, hole in the wall joints serving up North Eastern dumplings, messy fish markets, and of course, the pride of Bengal, the Hilsa fish. Is Kolkata up to par with the other major metropolitan cities of India? This episode finds out exactly that!

programme.title: Nevada: What else is there in Nevada for foodies besides Vegas?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Nevada: What else is there in Nevada for foodies besides Vegas?"
programme.desc: This investigative mission starts off in the sin city atmosphere of the Vegas strip. After a gluttonous stint at a generic buffet, Liesel is inspired to do a road trip to find iconic gems in the state of Nevada. From ghost towns, to monstrous foodie challenges, to hole in the wall dive bars in the middle of nowhere, this trip has it all. Liesel finds the resurgence of Basque cuisine in Northern Nevada, and learns that Reno can do fine dining as well! A trip to Virginia city also reveals that the Silver State has some haunted bars where patrons from the 1800s are rumored to be still imbibing and spooking locals! It’s a road trip in every sense of the word!

programme.title: Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Fight to Survive S2 - "Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 1"
programme.desc: Hunters Adrian Knopps and Garrett Hagen venture into the remotest part of Alaska’s Misty Fjord, hunting Moose and Bear. After a successful hunt Adrian finds himself trapped by a twenty foot tidal surge after Garrett fails to return with the skiff.

programme.title: Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Fight to Survive S2 - "Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 2"
programme.desc: After a successful hunt, Adrian Knopps’ hunting partner disappears taking their bear out to the boat. Now Adrian finds himself stranded on a tidal flat surround by bears and wolf packs and with massive storm bearing down on him. How will he survive?

programme.title: The Journal
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Fight to Survive S2 - "The Journal"
programme.desc: Pastor Mike Turner is on a solo hike across the continental divide in the unforgiving Wind Rivers Range of Wyoming, when he becomes hopelessly trapped under a boulder. He chronicles his grueling 11 day fight to survive in his own journal.

programme.title: Terrys Reindeer Game
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S2 - "Terrys Reindeer Game"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry test a scene from Reindeer Games when Ben Affleck and Charlize Theron get trapped under a frozen lake, and they escape by shooting 3 shots with a 12-gauge shot gun underwater to blast a hole in the ice to escape.

programme.title: Ex-Men The Origins of Terry
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S2 - "Ex-Men The Origins of Terry"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry test a famous scene from X-men. They are attempting to see if you can split a bullet with a Katana sword

programme.title: Pay Terry Back
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S2 - "Pay Terry Back"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry test 2 scenes from Mel Gibson’s film Payback. Mels character is in the back of a taxi when 4 bad guys pull up next to him in an SUV, they open fire and Mel uses a bad guy in the cab as a shield.

programme.title: FMX Nomads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FMX Nomads S1 - "FMX Nomads"
programme.desc: Join Dan Whitby, Samson Eaton and Arran Powley for a day in the life of globetrotting freestyle motocross team, Bolddog.

programme.title: The Road Runner is In-Violet, Dougie is Plum Crazy.
programme.sub-title: S16 : E07 Graveyard Carz S16 - "The Road Runner is In-Violet, Dougie is Plum Crazy."
programme.desc: Road Runners are overrunning the shop! Will continues to train his son Brody as the Graveyard’s newest painter.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.sub-title: S16 : E08 Graveyard Carz S16 - "Family Ties"
programme.desc: Two 1969 Hemi Charger R/T 4-speed cars arrive at the shop, one still runs, so Mark and Doug go for a spin!

programme.title: A-Body in the Graveyard
programme.sub-title: S16 : E09 Graveyard Carz S16 - "A-Body in the Graveyard"
programme.desc: Rarely seen among Mopar muscle, the Chrysler A-Bodies have some die-hard fans!

programme.title: Philippines
programme.desc: The nation of 7,000 islands has no problems with beach, sun, or sea; but they suffer tremendously with cuisine image. Jonathan lands in Manila to discover the top chefs are well aware of the issue and, following their advice, he launches off on an expedition to find part of the solution. Driving from headhunting tribal villages, to step-back-in-time colonial towns, to restaurants in the shadow of the American military behemoth an intriguing story slowly pieces together. In the dense jungle one treasure stays buried while another comes literally out of the woodwork. But danger always lurks.. zombie moray eels, landslide prone passes, and forbidden fields behind the rice paddies.

programme.title: Finland
programme.desc: Finland is that one Nordic country that is never on the global cuisine radar. However, the reserved Finns have been quietly perfecting their craft of foraging culture and incorporating it into their unique cuisine. Jonathan Legg explores the entire expanse of the country to understand it’s cuisine, and the ethos of the country’s top chefs; from amazing locally sourced cuisine in Helsinki, to an expedition in Lapland to learn about foraging and the Finnish delicacy, reindeer!

programme.title: Ireland
programme.desc: It’s the birthplace of Halloween, but the ghosts and ghouls which have canvassed the world have not scared up much interest in Irish cuisine. Mounting a classic motorcycle Jonathan tours a land of mystic traditions, boisterous locals, and iconic scenery. The world’s most magnetic pub culture draws him in, border conflict pushes him out, and dark legends pull him around. It’s an adventure soaked in rain, lore, and the food of ancestor’s past.

programme.title: India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Maximum Foodie S1 - "India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?"

Is Kolkata up to par with the other major metropolitan cities of India? This episode finds out exactly that!

programme.title: The Bullet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "The Bullet"
programme.desc: Today’s couples are Kevin and Patrycja from Norway and Nitzan and Nadav from Israel. Who will win todays game?

programme.title: The Torch
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "The Torch"
programme.desc: Today’s couples are Michael and Nina from Australia and Floris and Emile from Latvia. Which of these couples will escape the castle first?

programme.title: The Doll
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "The Doll"
programme.desc: Today’s teams are Mark from The USA and Elina from Finland against Sarah and Sebastien from Paris in France. Who will escape the castle?

programme.title: Stolen Future
programme.desc: Montana Game Wardens have their hands full with headless deer, trophy bull elk being poached and illegally tagged deer. But the Future of hunting is bright with a new batch of hunters.

programme.title: Night Chase
programme.desc: With a massive Winter storm bearing down on Northern Montana Wardens arent backing off. Wardens catch one guy in a web of lies at a check station while miles away they chase down a decoy shooter that refuses to give up.

programme.title: Wasted Dummy
programme.desc: This week Warden Lesofski searches out a hunting party that left their elk to rot. While Region 2 Wardens rush into a volatile situation after their decoy is shot from the road.

programme.title: The Intrusion of Strangers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Living Stone S1 - "The Intrusion of Strangers"
programme.desc: The introduction of Kieren and Nina is a jaw dropper for all the others, especially for Teresa who is the first one that has to deal with them in exile.

programme.title: Down to the Wire
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Living Stone S1 - "Down to the Wire"
programme.desc: The couples move deeper into the beautiful Okavango Delta with empty stomachs, their minds determined to survive and their camp surrounded by wildlife.

programme.title: Ruhr District
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Epic Exploring S2 - "Ruhr District"
programme.desc: Exploring in the industrial Ruhr District in Germany, Josh discovers abandoned steel and mining factories and experiences a miner’s life underneath the ground.

programme.title: Kuaotunu, Coromandel Peninsula
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Kuaotunu, Coromandel Peninsula"
programme.desc: Champion spear fisherman, Julian, takes Piri spear fishing and into the bush chasing pigs.

programme.title: Hawkes Bay
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Hawkes Bay"
programme.desc: Padre takes Piri to the river mouth fishing for kahawai. Plus we follow the dugs in search of wild pigs.

programme.title: Mahia
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Mahia"
programme.desc: Piri heads to Mahia to hit the ocean in search for kingfish with his guide, Justice. Later he goes diving for sea urchins and crayfish.

programme.title: Kaikoura
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Piri’s Tiki Tour S3 - "Kaikoura"
programme.desc: Piri travels to Kaikoura on the east coast of the South Island. Jaye takes Piri for an easy dive, and then the pair travel up into the hills to search for wild deer.

programme.title: Fourni
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 My Greek Odyssey S3 - "Fourni"
programme.desc: In episode six I’ve arrived in Fournoi. It’s a gorgeous slice of Greece, hidden between Ikaria to the west and Samos on the northeast.

programme.title: Ikaria
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 My Greek Odyssey S3 - "Ikaria"
programme.desc: In this episode I’m finishing my visit to Ikaria by spending time meeting some of the locals.

programme.title: Barbados and Lake Como
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Barbados and Lake Como"
programme.desc: From Barbados to Lake Como this episode is all about fabulous food and famous visitors.

programme.title: Borneo
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 A Taste of Travel S2 - "Borneo"
programme.desc: Scotty gets in touch with his ancestral roots and David gets a new friend in Borneo.

programme.title: South Africa, Fiji
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 A Taste of Travel S4 - "South Africa, Fiji"
programme.desc: Scotty is in beautiful South Africa, searching for the Big 5. Carolyne explores the wonderful ancient city of Rome. Lynton heads to the hills of Fiji and is rewarded with an amazing surprise. And Susannah is in the Big Apple, New York.

programme.title: Houston
programme.desc: Jamie Hancock was raised in Houston’s South Park area, a place notorious for gang violence, but also where hip hop artists created a new sound. Today, a new positive message is being created by people like Jamie through music.

programme.title: LA
programme.desc: In LA, we hike with wolfs, Ayurveda insights with Jay and a delicious meal from Karla. Marilia takes an adventurous leap from an airplane, showing the freedom in extreme sports.Tracy showcases the joy of pursuing passions with WCMX at the skate park.

programme.title: Maui
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Maui"
programme.desc: Tyler Larronde beats the odds to execute a seamless barrel at the legendary big wave known as Mavericks.

programme.title: Family Values
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Family Values"
programme.desc: A new generation of female chargers band together to compete in a unique big wave surfing ‘expression session’ on the north shore of Oahu.

programme.title: Skullbase
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Skullbase"
programme.desc: The Walsh twins reveal why water safety crews and rescue teams are the unsung heroes of big wave surfing.

programme.title: Conservation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Conservation"
programme.desc: In this episode Andi and Chelsey learn to dive, this becomes a vital skill for later in the show. This is the first time the girls are exposed to the threats of the ocean…

programme.title: Swimming with Whales
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Swimming with Whales"
programme.desc: The girls meet up with Dr Andrea Marshal and head out on an ocean safari. This is their most epic nautical adventure yet!

programme.title: Luxury Resorts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Paradise De Praia S1 - "Luxury Resorts"
programme.desc: The girls visit some of Mozambique’s most exclusive resorts and they do it in style. Andi and Chelsey compete in an ocean challenge for the ultimate prize, one night’s stay in the five star Flamingo Bay.

programme.title: Switzerland
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 A Simple Path S2 - "Switzerland"
programme.desc: Lugano, home of Morel, Oops Bar and The Warriors. To Basel for cheesy potatoes, DIY with Oli and Claudia, Pipoz, Portland Bowl, the president, creative concrete and wood and the Rock n Rollers. Back to The Beast then love underground at Bern Moosweg

programme.title: Berlin
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 A Simple Path S2 - "Berlin"
programme.desc: Berlin beautiful grunge, skate spoons, freestyle analogue,Griefswalder DIY and Skatesencia. Sketistan HQ, positive impact for kids the world over, NBU home of Hera, a space for expression. Place magazine, potato pants album cover prints and Templehof

programme.title: New York
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 A Simple Path S3 - "New York"
programme.desc: Yann Horowitz delves into NYCs skate scene, visiting shops, meeting legends, and exploring iconic spots. He highlights skateboardings community and inclusivity, expressing affection for the city and the connections forged through his passion.

programme.title: London
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx steps outside of her comfort zone to draw inspiration for her music track from urban youths in London’s Grime scene.

programme.title: Amsterdam
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx travels to Amsterdam to influence her music track and discovers it’s a whole lot more experimental than she imagined.

programme.title: Paris
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx travels to Paris, the city of love, for inspiration and discovers its diversity and a creative trend called retrofuture.

programme.title: Rotterdam
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Rotterdam"
programme.desc: Two European street artists are teaming up in the Netherlands for the ultimate Street Art Challenge but Mother Nature seems to be doing everything to ruin it.

programme.title: Lisbon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Lisbon"
programme.desc: Two street artists are fusing their styles together in one of the worlds finest cities, Lisbon.The challenge is left hanging by a thread when disaster strikes.

programme.title: Costa Rica
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Journey Within S1 - "Costa Rica"
programme.desc: Marilia explores Costa Rica, connecting with nature at Zunya, experiences a cacao ceremony with the Maleku Tribe, and finds wellness in Tamarindos Cala Luna. At La Senda, she learns to appreciate natures beauty and the importance of slowing down.

programme.title: Fiji
programme.desc: Eric Hanson goes off the beaten path as he hikes from one remote village to the next through Fiji’s mountainous landscape.

programme.title: New Zealand
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Epic Trails S1 - "New Zealand"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson explores the world-renowned Abel Tasman National Park by foot, and by sea kayak.

programme.title: Papua New Guinea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel Quest S1 - "Papua New Guinea"
programme.desc: There is no place on earth with such diverse cultures has Papua New Guinea. Bill follows the trail of the legendary headhunters deep into the rainforest only to uncover secrets even more mysterious.

programme.title: South Korea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travel Quest S1 - "South Korea"
programme.desc: Follow Bill as he tours a medieval aristocrats massive fortress that mirrors the Forbidden City. From giant burial mounds, to new Olympic sites, to still moving food, join Bill as he finds the soul of this modern ancient country.

programme.title: Vincent Valdez
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Back Home S1 - "Vincent Valdez"
programme.desc: Join Vincent Valdez on his trip back home to Mexico City. Watch as he learns about the local street art, sculpture, and music scenes in one of worlds most prolific art cities.

programme.title: La Marisoul
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Back Home S1 - "La Marisoul"
programme.desc: Join La Marisoul, lead singer and founding member of Grammy-winning band La Santa Cecilia, as she travels to Mexico and takes a closer look at where her parents grew up.

programme.title: Genaro Molina
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Back Home S1 - "Genaro Molina"
programme.desc: Join award-winning photojournalist, Genaro Molina, as he travels to Mexico to visit his parents home country.

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 A Simple Path S3 - "Brooklyn"
programme.desc: Yann Horowitz skateboards with the KCDC skateboarding community in Brooklyn. Where he explores gaming, art and grilling with Crossy, Natalie, Jacob, Eddie and Nate, culminating in a joyful skate event showcasing community, inclusivity and fun.

programme.title: New Jersey
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 A Simple Path S3 - "New Jersey"
programme.desc: Yann delves into New Jerseys skateboarding culture, meeting skateboarders who are into, fashion, horror, comedy, tattooing, and rug-making. He explores NJ Skate Shop and Freedom Skate Park, encountering Fred Gall and Brian Anderson.

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 A Simple Path S3 - "Philadelphia"
programme.desc: Yann immerses himself in Philadelphias skateboarding culture. He explores Nocturnal Skate Shop eats a Philly cheesesteak, visits Cloud 9 pottery studio, admires Adams art collection, skates with Celina, and experiences the creativity of FDR.

programme.title: Fiji
programme.desc: Eric Hanson goes off the beaten path as he hikes from one remote village to the next through Fiji’s mountainous landscape.

programme.title: New Zealand
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Epic Trails S1 - "New Zealand"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson explores the world-renowned Abel Tasman National Park by foot, and by sea kayak.

programme.title: Papua New Guinea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel Quest S1 - "Papua New Guinea"
programme.desc: There is no place on earth with such diverse cultures has Papua New Guinea. Bill follows the trail of the legendary headhunters deep into the rainforest only to uncover secrets even more mysterious.

programme.title: South Korea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travel Quest S1 - "South Korea"
programme.desc: Follow Bill as he tours a medieval aristocrats massive fortress that mirrors the Forbidden City. From giant burial mounds, to new Olympic sites, to still moving food, join Bill as he finds the soul of this modern ancient country.

programme.title: GOA and SINGAPORE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Travel in Style S1 - "GOA and SINGAPORE"
programme.desc: In Goa, the team look at the incredible wildlife and beaches of this former Portuguese Colony. Staying in Asia our team discover the presidential suite in Fullerton – Singapore.

programme.title: BRAZIL and SWEDEN
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Travel in Style S1 - "BRAZIL and SWEDEN"
programme.desc: In this episode our lucky crew stay in perhaps one of the most famous hotels on the planet – Copacabana Palace. In Sweden we stay in a really cool hotel that’s only just been built!

programme.title: China
programme.desc: The canals of Suzhou make you feel you are part of a fairytale, but the classical gardens make you feel like an elite scholar! Ashley explores China for the first time and becomes part of the traditional Chinese opera.

programme.title: Chiang Mai V Venice
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Jet Set S1 - "Chiang Mai V Venice"
programme.desc: Richard immerses himself in Thai culture, picking his own rice, learning to cook Thai style with a local top chef and paying a visit to a retired elephant park. While Gill heads to the Italian city of Venice, for a cheeky Bellini in Harry’s Bar.

programme.title: Eze (France) V Stockholm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Jet Set S1 - "Eze (France) V Stockholm"
programme.desc: From the French Riviera, Richard attempts to win the episode from his hotel, where every house in the town is actually a hotel suite. Meanwhile Gill tours the Swedish capital of Stockholm, sailing around the archipelago.

programme.title: The Panorama
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Panorama"
programme.desc: On opposite sides of the world, Adam and a member of the South African crew each attempt to conquer their fears.

programme.title: Into the Bush
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Into the Bush"
programme.desc: As Xander and his crew travel into the bush, they discover South Africa’s most beautiful qualities: national parks, safaris, and magnificent wildlife.

programme.title: Great Walls of Beijing
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Foodwise S2 - "Great Walls of Beijing"
programme.desc: From feasts of tofu made using well-water and fish caught fresh from the reservoir, to bubbling cauldrons of thinly-sliced lamb, the hilly suburbs of Beijing are home to some of the best-loved weekend escapes, and theyre all by the Great Wall.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Streets S1 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Los Angeles based electronic music producer and DJ Moe Espinosa, aka Drumcell, has created sonic soundscapes which tell cinematic stories with his music. Moe has always tried to avoid commercialism and by having a vision that remains independent.

programme.title: Matthieu Dupuis Baumal – Chateau de la Gaude
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Taste of France S1 - "Matthieu Dupuis Baumal – Chateau de la Gaude"
programme.desc: In this program we’ll explore the story of the skilled Chef Matthieu Dupuis Baumal, his style of cooking and how he took his team to greatness in only a couple of months! We’ll also visit one of the best olive oil producers in the world.

programme.title: Amandine Chaignot – Pouliche
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Taste of France S1 - "Amandine Chaignot – Pouliche"
programme.desc: In this program Amandine Chaignot demonstrates the extent of her talent, serving refined vegetarian-focused cuisine. We’ll get to know her secrets for stimulating flavors and the principles behind her raw, refined French cuisine.

programme.title: Antonin Bonnet – Quinsou
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Taste of France S1 - "Antonin Bonnet – Quinsou"
programme.desc: In this program we’ll get an insight of the importance of quality, as Antonin sources his ingredients with diligence. Making careful use of all elements, his kitchen manages to match sustainability with elegance and excellence.

programme.title: Nose to Tail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Order Up! S1 - "Nose to Tail"
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, Hudson explores Nose to Tail dining where he learns to cook every part of an animal from bird to goat, facing lots of obstacles along the way. This sustainable way of cooking is definitely not for the squeamish, but it’s worth it.

programme.title: Using Your Noodle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Order Up! S1 - "Using Your Noodle"
programme.desc: Hudson goes to Singapore to learn everything he needs to know about noodle-making and Asian ingredients, taking a dive into the cultural staple while facing challenges in prepping and cooking noodles, including recreating a dish from taste alone.

programme.title: Whats the Secret Sauce?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Order Up! S1 - "Whats the Secret Sauce?"
programme.desc: Singaporeans are crazy about their curry and that’s why Hudson wants to find out everything about the different spices and ingredients that constitute an authentic Indian curry, and the elevated renditions of curries from burgers to curry fish heads.

programme.title: Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?"
programme.desc: Liesel embarks on a journey to the country of over 7000 islands, the Philippines. From the serene to the seedy, she combs through metro Manila discovering the food; this culinary spectrum includes bouncing around trying the popular fast food joints, meeting the local experts such as blogger Cheryl Tiu, a taste of history at the worlds oldest Chinatown, an unexpected dancing session at the Spanish haunts of Manila, to rubbing shoulders with the elite Chefs of the city. All in a quest to answer just why Filipino cuisine is unheard of!

programme.title: Thailand: US Thai Food vs Authentic-Thai, which is the winner?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Thailand: US Thai Food vs Authentic-Thai, which is the winner?"
programme.desc: Liesel embarks on a journey to the country of over 7000 islands, the Philippines. From the serene to the seedy, she combs through metro Manila discovering the food; this culinary spectrum includes bouncing around trying the popular fast food joints, meeting the local experts such as blogger Cheryl Tiu, a taste of history at the worlds oldest Chinatown, an unexpected dancing session at the Spanish haunts of Manila, to rubbing shoulders with the elite Chefs of the city. All in a quest to answer just why Filipino cuisine is unheard of!

A tale of walking food tours, hole in the wall joints serving up North Eastern dumplings, messy fish markets, and of course, the pride of Bengal, the Hilsa fish. programme.title: How to Order Chinese Food
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Foodwise S2 - "How to Order Chinese Food"
programme.desc: In this episode, hosts Tianran and Eva will give you a crash course on everything from choosing the right restaurant, to pairing dishes according to color, aroma, taste and form, so that at the end, you too can feast your friends like a pro.

programme.title: Eat Like Confucius
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Foodwise S2 - "Eat Like Confucius"
programme.desc: "Foodwise" host Tianran He explores the ancient town of Qufu, the birthplace of Confucius.

programme.title: The Herbal Way of Life
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Foodwise S2 - "The Herbal Way of Life"
programme.desc: In this Foodwise episode, our hosts Tianran He and Eva May explore this ancient concept of medicine food homology as they taste their way through different herbs.

programme.title: Clement Bouvier – Ursus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Taste of France S1 - "Clement Bouvier – Ursus"
programme.desc: In his quest to amaze his guests, Clement aims to always surprise, always exceed their expectations. By bringing the very forest to the table, both in his cuisine and in architecture, his visitors are in for a special and unique treat.

programme.title: As Fresh As It Gets
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Order Up! S1 - "As Fresh As It Gets"
programme.desc: From floating fish farms to plucking fresh greens from a garden, Hudson continues his culinary journey through Signapore and finds out how local ingredients make their way from farm to table. Even facing an unexpected reptilian ingredient…

programme.title: The Ultimate Test
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Order Up! S1 - "The Ultimate Test"
programme.desc: In his final days in Singapore, Hudson explores modern interpretations of traditional recipes, then creates a menu for the US Ambassador and learns from a Michelin-starred chef. His journey ends when he cooks for local celebrities, and own VIP guest.

programme.title: Nevada: What else is there in Nevada for foodies besides Vegas?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Nevada: What else is there in Nevada for foodies besides Vegas?"
programme.desc: This investigative mission starts off in the sin city atmosphere of the Vegas strip. After a gluttonous stint at a generic buffet, Liesel is inspired to do a road trip to find iconic gems in the state of Nevada. From ghost towns, to monstrous foodie challenges, to hole in the wall dive bars in the middle of nowhere, this trip has it all. Liesel finds the resurgence of Basque cuisine in Northern Nevada, and learns that Reno can do fine dining as well! A trip to Virginia city also reveals that the Silver State has some haunted bars where patrons from the 1800s are rumored to be still imbibing and spooking locals! It’s a road trip in every sense of the word!

programme.title: Rome: What are the tourists missing out on?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Rome: What are the tourists missing out on?"
programme.desc: Italy is a vacationer’s paradise. The food, the people, the sights and sounds, the history! But are the tourists doing it right when it comes to the trying out authentic food in Rome? Liesel embarks on a mission to explore the street food of the city. With the help of her food journalist buddy, Saverio de Luca, Liesel sifts through pasticceri, food festivals, touristed hotspots, all in an effort to understand real Roman food.

programme.title: Emlia Romagna: What’s the food like?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Emlia Romagna: What’s the food like?"
programme.desc: The region of Emilia Romagna is lush with gentle rolling hills where time honored ingredients like truffles, olives, and vast vineyards can be found. But this region is usually overshadowed by it’s more famous neighboring cities, Florence and Venice. To understand the food of this region, Liesel explores the quaint sea-side town of Rimini and the hugely impressive Bologna. Its a tale of discovering local foodie passion that allows Liesel to hunt for truffles and try her hand in making her own gelato, a the world’s only Gelato University!

programme.title: Xilingol
programme.desc: In Xilin Gol, the local cuisines here are so attractive to the tourists, such as the roasted lamb is a traditional local dish. And the fired stone fried lamb is so hard to find if you are not traveling to Inner Mongolia.Just join in this visual trip!

programme.title: Kunming
programme.desc: Join host Tianran He in Kunming, the capital of Yunnan province in southwest China. Named the Spring City for its perennially good weather, Kunming is one of Chinas most ethnically diverse cities, something thats reflected in its food.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 1"
programme.desc: Join Chef Sara Aqel as she explores Jordan’s northern produce, landscapes, and historical sights before hosting an idyllic dinner at Amman’s Citadel.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 2"
programme.desc: Join Chef Ali Ghzawi as he takes us on a journey through Jordans southern sights of Petra, Aqaba, and Wadi Rum, using the best local produce, for a dinner at the Dead Sea.

programme.title: Mushroom
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Mushroom"
programme.desc: Lauren dives into the fascinating world of mushrooms, exploring their flavors, textures, and health benefits. She shows how to make savory mushroom sausage rolls and delicious mushroom steaks, showcasing the versatility of these earthy ingredients.

programme.title: Chocolate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Chocolate"
programme.desc: Indulge in Laurens exploration of the chocolate world as she uncovers its unique types and characteristics. From savory chocolate salsa to raw vegan cake, her mix of sweet and savory recipes leaves a lasting appreciation for this beloved ingredient.

programme.title: Philippines
programme.desc: The nation of 7,000 islands has no problems with beach, sun, or sea; but they suffer tremendously with cuisine image. Jonathan lands in Manila to discover the top chefs are well aware of the issue and, following their advice, he launches off on an expedition to find part of the solution. Driving from headhunting tribal villages, to step-back-in-time colonial towns, to restaurants in the shadow of the American military behemoth an intriguing story slowly pieces together. In the dense jungle one treasure stays buried while another comes literally out of the woodwork. But danger always lurks.. zombie moray eels, landslide prone passes, and forbidden fields behind the rice paddies.

programme.title: Finland
programme.desc: Finland is that one Nordic country that is never on the global cuisine radar. However, the reserved Finns have been quietly perfecting their craft of foraging culture and incorporating it into their unique cuisine. Jonathan Legg explores the entire expanse of the country to understand it’s cuisine, and the ethos of the country’s top chefs; from amazing locally sourced cuisine in Helsinki, to an expedition in Lapland to learn about foraging and the Finnish delicacy, reindeer!

programme.title: Ireland
programme.desc: It’s the birthplace of Halloween, but the ghosts and ghouls which have canvassed the world have not scared up much interest in Irish cuisine. Mounting a classic motorcycle Jonathan tours a land of mystic traditions, boisterous locals, and iconic scenery. The world’s most magnetic pub culture draws him in, border conflict pushes him out, and dark legends pull him around. It’s an adventure soaked in rain, lore, and the food of ancestor’s past.

programme.title: Samos
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 My Greek Odyssey S3 - "Samos"
programme.desc: In the final episode of the series we travel to a place that holds special memories for both Helen and I. The island I’m talking of, is Samos!

programme.title: Kos
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 My Greek Odyssey S4 - "Kos"
programme.desc: Peter is arriving on the island of Kos. It’s the third-largest island in the Dodecanese and the second-most populous. So apart from there being plenty of landmasses to explore there are also loads of interesting people to chat to along the way.

programme.title: Sorrento, Denarau
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 A Taste of Travel S4 - "Sorrento, Denarau"
programme.desc: Carolyne explores the gorgeous town of Sorrento, Italy. Scotty continues his trip in South Africa and samples some of the local delicacies. Lynton makes a splash in Denarau, Fiji. And Susannah wraps up her discovery tour of New York.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kylman saan saapuessa aikaisin ja velkojen kasaantuessa miehisto tyontaa, vetaa ja raahaa mammuttimaisen ja mahdollisesti kauden pelastavan lohkareen leirille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia ja Robin yrittavat tehda vaikutuksen uusiin liikekumppaneihinsa, mutta ensimmaiset paivat uudella alueellaan Bullion Creekissa ovat turhauttavia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivoksesta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivokselta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Elokuun hurjan lumimyrskyn takia Claudian ja Robinin on pakko jaada 2 Mileen, kun taas Gary ja Garon yrittavat pelastaa tilanteen ajamalla myrskyn lapi ja tuomalla heille tarvikkeita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin tekee vaikean paatoksen rakkaan kaivosautonsa Six packin suhteen toisen kalliiksi tulleen rikkoutumisen jalkeen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Talven lahestyessa Claudia ajaa uupuneen miehistonsa murtumispisteeseen, mika saa kiihkon leimahtamaan ja pakottaa Claudian viimein hyvaksymaan tappionsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Uusi kaivoskausi on taynna ikavia yllatyksia, mutta epatodennakoinen tapahtuma pelastaa tilanteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh on kyllastynyt tyoskentelemaan isalleen, joten han perustaa oman kuorma-autoyrityksensa uudella rekalla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Armeijan kuorma-auto hajoaa julmalla tiella kaivokselle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Gary ja poikansa pelastavat vanhan armeijan kuorma-auton, mutta sen ajaminen kaivokselle on raakaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Garon ja Josh menettavat Six packin hallinnan mutaisilla teilla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Justin lentaa paikalle uuden vaijerisahan kanssa, mutta menettaa malttinsa yrittaessaan asentaa sita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto kohtaa loputtomasti ongelmia yrittaessaan leikata palan 18 metrin pituisesta linssista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia tuo paikalle ison porauskaluston, ja hanella on vain nelja paivaa aikaa loytaa paras jadepaikka, mutta han ja Robin eivat osaa paattaa, mista etsia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehet ottavat yhteen, kun he loppukauden kiireet pakottavat heidat tyoskentelemaan kahdessa kaivoksessa yhta aikaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto irrottaa jadelohkareita J-linssista, mutta iso ongelma tiella uhkaa kaikkea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Claudia ja Robini etsivat jadea poraamalla tuloksetta, edes yhtion geologit eivat paase yksimielisyyteen suunnitelmasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada raskaan kaluston vuorelle ennen kuin tulvivat joet katkaisevat paasyn kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Ilmassa on jannitetta, kun miehisto yrittaa saada raskasta kalustoa mutaiselle, lohkareiden peittamalle 120 kilometrin pituiselle polulle perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksen vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa saada koneensa kulkemaan vyoryvien jokien yli perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksensa vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan on vakuuttunut siita, etta Dynastyn alueella veden tayttaman kuopan alla on jadea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin yrittaa uhmata fysiikan lakeja saadakseen massiivisen uuden kasarmin Wolverinen alueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn porukkaa koettelee huono onni, ja jokainen keksii ainutlaatuisia ratkaisuja huonon onnen karkottamiseksi.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaikki innostuvat, kun he vihdoin alkavat kaivaa esiin lupaavia vihreita lohkareita, joiden miehisto uskoo olevan miljoonien arvoisia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun ulkomaiset sijoittajat piipahtavat yllattaen tarkistamaan Wolverinen kaivosalueen toita, ja Alan yrittaa rauhoittaa tilannetta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Wolverinen kaivoksella vihdoin loydetaan lupaavia lohkareita, miehisto huomaa, etta he ovat saattaneet menna tonttinsa rajojen ulkopuolelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitys kasvaa, kun kaivoskauden loppu lahestyy, ja Jade Cityn miehisto haluaa loytaa kallisarvoisen lohkareen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn kaivostyolaiset yrittavat loytaa rikkauksia - tarpeeksi suuren jadelohkareen, joka tekee vaikutuksen sijoittajiin - ennen kauden paattymista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian ja Robinin testaamattomat koneet alkavat hajota raaalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa ylittaa tulvivia jokia matkalla kaivokselle koneet mukanaan, mutta Josh jaa jalkeen ongelmallisen kaivinkoneen takia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh jaa jumiin pitkalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivokselle, kun pultit irtoavat kaivinkoneesta eika han voi kutsua apua.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaivoskausi alkaa, ja vaikka jadea ei nay, rekkaonnettomuus tuo Jade Citylle onnea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Guysta tulee Wolverinen johtaja, ja uuden tyontekijan palkkaaminen uhkaa suistaa hanen tehtavansa loytaa kauden ensimmainen jadelohkare.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Juuri kun Wolverinen miehisto tehostaa turvallisuusmenetelmiaan, uusi tyontekija Jay romahtaa, mika paljastaa heidan hatavalmiutensa sarot.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh kayttaa uutta kaivinkonetta, kun taas arvottomien kivien kasa saa Claudian harkitsemaan uutta strategiaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan tuo Jade Cityyn ostajaryhman, mika saa Claudian tiimin paniikkiin ja etsimaan kauden ensimmaiset myytavat jadelohkareet.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun miehisto rampii mudassa etsiessaan miljoonan dollarin arvoista lohkaretta, Josh riskeeraa puolen miljoonan dollarin arvoisen kaluston yrittaessaan vetaa rekkaansa pois vajoamasta.
